metadata.Reward Type: Profit Sharing: Up to 10% of Organization's Net Profits - (some restrictions apply)
metadata.description:
iBlockchain Bank & Trust Technologies Co., registered in the State of Florida, USA, (iBBT”) is establishing a Marketplace, known as RealBloc, through a vertically integrated business model, powering “smart real estate trusts.” 

RealBlock’s comprehensive new platform encompasses a comprehensive eco-system of inter-related components of the real estate transaction by integrating distinct roles: Interchange Banker & Mortgage Banker, Traditional Real Estate Brokerage/Sales Agent, Title & Escrow Agent, Property & Casualty Insurance and Home Warranty will be captured on the platform. (* the Phase 1 launch will conduct necessary due diligence regarding local, state & federal regulatory compliance pertaining to all “agency roles”)

RealBloc Summary - Our Message

Real Bloc creates a distinct real-estate marketplace utilizing fractionalized asset ownership, tokenized mortgages, residential smart-home, and extended home services. The model also increases the “value capture” for Real Block stakeholders & investors and provides realtors, property buyers & sellers enhanced economic value.

The architecture of this new technology-driven platform creates a new real estate business methodology, built on the cornerstone and foundations of the traditional real estate transaction: 

  • Buyers & Sellers (our “Clients”) join the Real Bloc “Network”; 
  • Brokers/Agents join the Network as service providers (via our “Concierge”); 
  • Mortgage, P&C Insurance, and Title/Escrow are provided within the Network and incentivize both clients & concierge, driving ancillary product capture within the Network; 
  • market efficiency for consumers is optimized, increasing profitability through the velocity of transactions flows to investment stakeholders, 
  • portability of real estate ownership is established, which facilitates more widespread homeownership and real estate investment.

Technologies like blockchain and smart contracts fundamentally disrupt how real estate markets are financed, intermediated, and transacted. 

RealBlock 

is a hybrid smart grid realty trust and private banking protocol that creates a vertically integrated business model. 

It transforms the cumbersome analog and legal procedures of existing loan origination, investment, and brokerage practices to yield competitive value-capture in real estate markets. This means traditional banks and mortgage lenders no longer monopolize or manipulate markets and government subsidies to their advantage. It also means traditional realtor/brokers operate a sustainable, value-accruing concierge business model that streamlines end-to-end transactions ("buy, sell, rent, lease, invest") and provides ancillary home services for the homeowner.
